message:
SYSTEM: 2022.11.PublicProcurementNLPChallenges.pdf: Página 31
Challenges in Public Procurement textual data
Exploiting previous data
31
Problem: How to retrieve info
•
They want to be able to make queries to the
system.
•
How many pills X were bought last year?
•
Could this be done with a KG?
Possible Solutions
•
QA system
•
Preprocessing NLP in tenders to derive triples.
•
Probably SPARQL queries should be expressed
as natural language.
speaker: SYSTEM
